articles.title: Tár and The Banshees of Inisherin take top honours at London film critics awards - The Guardian
articles.description: Cate Blanchett wins actress of the year while Banshees picks up three acting awards, including actor of the year for Colin Farrell

articles.title: Paco Rabanne obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Designer of radical metal and plastic garments, who later became known for his bestselling perfumes
